name: Mountain Blob
description:
You are a blob who has been captured from Blobland and taken into the mountains. You must find your way out of the mountains and return to Blobland. To move, click when the arrow in the bottom right corner is pointing in your desired direction. Use the portals, avoid the spikes, and don't fall off the map.

This is not an easy game - do not get upset if you cannot finish the whole game!

If you don't want to play this game on itch.io, you can also play it here.

This game was made for the 1 Button Jam 2020.

Technical info:

This game is made with HTML and JavaScript. It uses the pixi.js library for graphics. It uses my wrk.js library as a game engine and for utility functions. This game may be a bit unstable as it is the first project using the wrk.js game engine, which I finished coding on the day before the jam.
